articles.content: Crowdfunder launched to get Positive News to NHS staffThe Positive News team is raising funds via a Crowdfunder campaign to distribute thousands of complimentary copies of the magazine to NHS staff. After a number of hospitals got in touch to request copies, … [+371 chars]

articles.title: Coronavirus 'map' identifies key virus entry points into the body | Imperial News - Imperial College London
articles.description: Scientists are creating a map of the human body to identify locations where the COVID-19 virus can enter human cells.
articles.content:
Scientists are creating a map of the human body to identify locations where the COVID-19 virus can enter human cells.
The research, from a number of international institutions including Imperial College London, has so far identified likely initial infection … [+5951 chars]

articles.content:
An idea that might seem outlandish at first is gaining some ground as a way to speed development of a coronavirus vaccine: intentionally infecting people with the virus as part of a trial.
